channel.title: Mapback
channel.description:
Well. I was trying to edit all of my sprites...But, the mapback sprite will not change. I'm guessing it's still loading from the cache, but when I go into class30 sub2 sub1 it's in there. It's also in my client class.
I'm not really sure what to do from here....Can anyone help? I'm using Galkon's client base. (non-renamed)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2009, 05:40:01 am[/size][hr]Anyone? At all.

item.title: Mapback
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well. I was trying to edit all of my sprites…But, the mapback sprite will not change. I’m guessing it’s still loading from the cache, but when I go into class30 sub2 sub1 it’s in there. It’s also in my client class.

I’m not really sure what to do from here…Can anyone help? I’m using Galkon’s client base. (non-renamed)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2009, 05:40:01 am[/size][hr]Anyone? At all.
